com.mvp4g.client.history
Interface HistoryConverter<T>

Type Parameters:
T - type of the object used with the event associated with the converter.
public interface HistoryConverter<T>

Interface that defines method to convert a token from/to an event.

Author:
plcoirier

Method Summary
 void convertFromToken(java.lang.String eventType, java.lang.String param, EventBus eventBus)
          Convert a token to event's object and trigger the event bus.

Specific information can also be retrieved (from a cookie or server for example).
 java.lang.String convertToToken(java.lang.String eventType, T form)
          Convert the object of the event to a string in order to store into the URI.

Specific information can also be stored (in a cookie for example)
 

Method Detail

convertToToken

java.lang.String convertToToken(java.lang.String eventType,
                                T form)
Convert the object of the event to a string in order to store into the URI.

Specific information can also be stored (in a cookie for example)

Parameters:
eventType - type of the event
form - object of the event
Returns:
string to store if the URI. If you don't want to store anything in the URI, return null or empty string.

convertFromToken

void convertFromToken(java.lang.String eventType,
                      java.lang.String param,
                      EventBus eventBus)
Convert a token to event's object and trigger the event bus.

Specific information can also be retrieved (from a cookie or server for example).

Parameters:
eventType - type of the event that was stored in the token
param - string that was stored in the token, used to retrieve event's object (can be null if no information was stored in the URI)
eventBus - event bus of the application
